title: Glacier National Park: At Home In This Place
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Park Videos     At Home In This Place                At Home In This Place                         It’s Like Being Home Blackfeet Cultural Leaders: Ancestors “It’s Like Being Home”  Duration:5 minutes                                 We Are the Owners of Glacier National Park Blackfeet Cultural Leaders: The 1895 Agreement “We Are the Owners of Glacier National Park”  Duration:3 minutes, 42 seconds                                The Park is a Living Creature Blackfeet Cultural Leaders: The Blackfeet Today “The Park is a Living Creature”  Duration:2 minutes, 45 seconds                                One of Our Homelands Kootenai Cultural Leaders: Ancestors “One of Our Homelands”  Duration:4 minutes, 7 seconds                                The Place Where They Danced Kootenai Cultural Leaders: Lake McDonald Area “The Place Where They Danced”  Duration:3 minutes, 26 seconds                                We Ask That You Walk Lightly Kootenai Cultural Leaders: The Kootenai Today “We Ask That You Walk Lightly”  Duration:4 minutes, 5 seconds                                A Sacred Place Salish and Pend d’Oreille Cultural Leaders: Ancestors “A Sacred Place”  Duration:3 minutes, 43 seconds                                I Can Almost Hear Our Ancestors Salish and Pend d’Oreille Cultural Leaders: The Salish and Pend d’Oreille Today “I Can Almost Hear Our Ancestors”  Duration:3 minutes, 30 seconds                                A Hope for Future Generations Salish and Pend d’Oreille Cultural Leaders: Tomorrow “A Hope for Future Generations”  Duration:2 minutes, 45 seconds
